etymology.description: 水(水) (shuǐ, "water") + 相(相) (xiāng, "mutual consultation") = river with phonetic value -> Xiang River
etymology.interpretation: The character 湘(xiāng) represents the Xiang River. It combines 水(shuǐ, "water") indicating the river aspect with 相(xiāng, "mutual consultation") providing the phonetic component, linking it to a known river name in China.

examples.english: The waters of the Xiang River are clear.

examples.chinese: 我沿着湘江(我沿著湘江)，欣赏沿途风光(欣賞沿途風光)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ yánzhe Xiāngjiāng, xīnshǎng yántú fēngguāng.
examples.english: I strolled along the Xiang River, enjoying the scenery along the way.

examples.chinese: 湘江发源于高山(湘江發源於高山)，孕育了无数才俊(孕育了無數才俊)。
examples.pinyin: Xiāngjiāng fāyuán yú gāoshān, yùnyù le wúshù cáijùn.
examples.english: The Xiang River originates from high mountains and has nurtured countless talented individuals.
